panels.description: PUT + POST + PATCH + DELETE with 2xx success response
panels.title: Total HTTP Write Requests success

panels.description: PUT + POST + PATCH + DELETE with 4xx client error or 5xx server error

panels.description: GET + OPTION +HEAD with 4xx client error or 5xx server error
panels.title: Total HTTP Read Requests Failures
Log counts except debug and info

panels.description: The number of requests send per second
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Request/Sec Rate

panels.description: The total number of fetch requests.
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Total Requests

panels.description: The average number of records consumed per second for a topic.
panels.title: Kafka Records Consumed/Sec Rate

panels.description: The number of fetch requests per second.
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Fetch Requests/Sec Rate

panels.description: The max time taken for any fetch request.
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Fetch Latency Max

panels.description: The average time taken for a fetch request.
panels.title: Kafka Consumer Fetch Latency Avg

panels.description: The current size of the wait queue for a connection from the pool
panels.title: Mongodb Driver Pool Waitqueuesize

panels.description: Count of connections that are currently in use
panels.title: Mongodb Driver Pool Checkedout

panels.description: An approximation of the percent of CPU time used by GC activities over the last lookback period or since monitoring began, whichever is shorter, in the range [0..1]
panels.title: CPU time used by GC

panels.description: Count of positive increases in the size of the old generation memory pool before GC to after GC
panels.title: Heap Gain Byte Size

panels.description: Max size of long-lived heap memory pool
panels.title: JVM GC Max Data Size Bytes

panels.description: Size of long-lived heap memory pool after reclamation
panels.title: Long Lived Heap Pool
